CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 19 reads: "2. Judge Lois McBride, who opened fair ceremonies, is shown with Mrs. Prothro"
TitMainTitle: Louise Prothro and Judge Lois McBride standing behind table with plate of food, in demonstration kitchen for the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair in Syria Mosque
